document_data.name: Whelandrin
document_data.mainbody: '''Whelandrin''' was a servant in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He gave off an impassible appearance, and took care to stay expressionless.
document_data.Activities: Whelandrin was a trusty under the nobleman [[Marlin Stormserpent]]'s roof in Suzail. He was not above accepting money from elsewhere.
document_data.History: In [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, after the [[blueflame ghost]]s that Marlin Stormserpent summoned completed their first assignment for him successfully, Marlin called on one of his trusties, Whelandrin, to find him a wench for enjoyment.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|371|35}}
